# perFrameHDRDisplayMetadataPolicy

**Instance Property**

Configures the policy for display of HDR display metadata on the rendered frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var perFrameHDRDisplayMetadataPolicy: AVVideoComposition.PerFrameHDRDisplayMetadataPolicy { get set }
```

## Discussion

Allows the system to identify situations where it can generate HDR metadata and attach it to the rendered video frame.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoComposition/PerFrameHDRDisplayMetadataPolicy-swift.struct/propagate], which indicates the system propagates any HDR metadata attached to the composed frame to the rendered video frames.

## Configuring HDR metadata

- **AVVideoComposition.PerFrameHDRDisplayMetadataPolicy**: A type that defines the policy for handling of per frame HDR metadata.
